about_the_game:
Buffed is the ultimate solution for gamers to Capture and Share their adventures.

You can now play games on PC and have all your gaming memories instantly on your mobile device, where you can edit, catalogue, and share your moments with the community and your friends.

Key Features:


Capture and Share - Record from your PC and instantly turn your best moments into shareable clips. You can also share your plays directly within the Buffed iOS app and discover content from other gamers on the main feed!

Auto Clipping - The app automatically recognizes key moments in your gameplay, such as epic kills or downs, and creates clips for you. Auto Clipping works for Warzone, Fortnite, and Apex. More supported games to come! PUBG is next on the list.

Voice-Activated Clipping - Say "clip that," and Buffed will create a clip for you in real-time.

Full Game Sessions - You can always go back to the recording of your full game session and pick the best moments later. We keep your last 5 full game sessions.

Gallery of Your Coolest Moments - Organize your moments by adding tags and filters. It’s so awesome to have easy access to your gaming memories on your mobile device.

Stream to Youtube and Twitch - Capture your best moments and manage your clips with Buffed, while seamlessly streaming to Twitch and YouTube. You can choose to stream to either Twitch or YouTube, or stream to both platforms simultaneously!

Our Buffed Steam app is super lightweight and most of the processing is offloaded to our cloud services so that you have most of your resources available for gaming.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5 2500K, AMD Ryzen 1300X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 900 Series, Radeon RX 400 Series, Intel HD Graphics 500
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Hardware encoders recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel i7 8700K, AMD Ryzen 1600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 10 Series, Radeon 5000 Series, Intel Xe
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Hardware encoders recommended
